name: The Ten Minute Game
description:
The Ten Minute Game, the game that lasts 10 minutes... after all the failed attempts

This game is in beta, showing one of the few levels that are going to appear later

Controls: WASD to move, E to interact, F to toggle flashlight, Left and Right Arrow keys to switch PC pages

NOTES (IMPORTANT):

- 64-Bit Only

- You can't move while repairing the camera system, so if you need to abort early, press backspace

- The bookshelf in the corner is your friend, interact with it to get information that you need

- It gives you the option to "repair generator" on the second PC page, but it doesn't do anything yet

- The Flashlight is limited, flickering will tell you if it's about to run out

- I am my only beta tester, so if there are any bugs, letting me know would help a lot
